issue.message: Must be one of: ListBuilder.LARGE_IMAGE, ListBuilder.SMALL_IMAGE, ListBuilder.ICON_IMAGE, ListBuilder.RAW_IMAGE_SMALL, ListBuilder.RAW_IMAGE_LARGE, ListBuilder.UNKNOWN_IMAGE, ListBuilder.ACTION_WITH_LABEL

This call references a method added in API level 26; however, the containing class androidx.slice.builders.impl.ListBuilderBasicImpl is reachable from earlier API levels and will fail run-time class verification.

This call references a method added in API level 26; however, the containing class androidx.slice.builders.impl.ListBuilderImpl is reachable from earlier API levels and will fail run-time class verification.
